title: Validate DLP/DRM can able to detect and apply the policy for multiple policies with "Alert and Continue" Feature
custom_preconds:
- MIP feature should be enabled
- Setup Microsot Instance under "Settings --> Sensitivity Label Integration"
- Create a FileFilter-1 by selecting Sensitivity label and make sure the labels are synced for the instance.
- Create a FileFilter-2 by selecting Sensitivity label and make sure the labels are synced for the instance.
- Create a DLP profile D1 by cloning the DLP-PCI and add the file filter F1.
- Create a DLP profile D2 by cloning the DLP-PCI and add the file filter F2.
- Setup Exchange Domain in SMTP Under Settings -> Security Cloud Platform -> SMTP -> add Exchange account
custom_steps:
- Create Email Outbound Policy P1 with DLP Profile D1 and select "Continue policy evaluation after match" with Alert Action
- Create Email Outbound Policy P2 with DLP Profile D2 with Alert Action
- make sure the Policy P1 is on top and below that Policy P2 should be placed
- Send Email E1 with subject+body + Un-encrypted sensitivity label matching to both Policy P1 and P2
custom_expected:
- SMTP proxy should receive emails and send for DLP for inspection.
- policy evaluation should continue to happen after Policy P1 and Policy P2 should also be matched.
- the alerts should generated and visible in WebUI.
